Uses of Interface
wexpman.hookobjects.ExperimentHook

  • Packages that use ExperimentHook 
    Package Description
    wexpman.domainobjects  
    wexpman.hookobjects.impl  

    • Uses of ExperimentHook in wexpman.domainobjects

      Methods in wexpman.domainobjects with parameters of type ExperimentHook 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected static ExperimentCaseResult ExperimentCaseResult.getExperimentCaseResult(String name, NativeJob nativeJob, File permanentHolderDirectory, File temporaryHolderDirectory, ExperimentHook hook)
      Gets the experiment case result for the given native job If the experiment is not executing this method will limit itself to trying to retrieve the potentially existing result from the local store

    • Uses of ExperimentHook in wexpman.hookobjects.impl

      Classes in wexpman.hookobjects.impl that implement ExperimentHook 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ExperimentHookBehavior
      A custom container of code that can be executed at specific points in the lifecycle of the application Base class for all hooks The base implementation uses locks to ensure that hooks on the same element will not run concurrently, any other concurrency, synchronization or communication features must be provided by the concrete implementation
      class  StopAtFirstProcessingHook
      This is a demo hook which will stop the experiment on the first time it is processed
